content: Oct 3 Cardtronics Plc  which describes itself as the world's biggest operator of non-bank ATMs  said on Monday it would buy independent Canadian ATM owner DirectCash Payments Inc (DCPayments) in a deal valued at about $460 million including debt to boost its presence in Canada and the United Kingdom.
name: First Data Corporation
title: Cardtronics to buy DirectCash Payments in $460 mln deal

content: LAS VEGAS  May 11 Billionaire investor Leon Cooperman  who has steadfastly forecast that U.S. stocks will move higher  on Wednesday said his hedge fund firm Omega Advisors is betting on Tetragon Financial Group and First Data Corp to gain in value.
name: First Data Corporation
title: Billionaire stock picker Cooperman gives his recommendations in Las Vegas
